trans-unit.source: By default packages that require BLAS/LAPACK linear algebra interfaces should link to OpenBLAS using depends_on "openblas" and passing -DBLA_VENDOR=OpenBLAS to CMake (applies to CMake based formula only) rather than Apple’s Accelerate framework, or the default reference lapack implementation. Apple’s implementation of BLAS/LAPACK is outdated and may introduce hard-to-debug problems. The reference lapack formula is fine, although it is not actively maintained or tuned. For this reason, formulae needing BLAS/LAPACK should link with OpenBLAS.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，需要BLAS / LAPACK线性代数接口的软件包应使用 depends_on "openblas" 链接到OpenBLAS，并将 -DBLA_VENDOR=OpenBLAS 传递给CMake（仅适用于基于CMake的公式），而不是Apple的Accelerate框架或默认的参考lapack实现。苹果公司对BLAS / LAPACK的实现已过时，可能会引入难以调试的问题。尽管没有积极维护或调整参考 lapack 公式，但它很好。因此，需要BLAS / LAPACK的公式应与OpenBLAS链接。

trans-unit.source: By default, bottles will be built for the oldest CPU supported by the OS/architecture you’re building for (Core 2 for 64-bit OSs). This ensures that bottles are compatible with all computers you might distribute them to. If you really want your bottles to be optimised for something else, you can pass the --bottle-arch= option to build for another architecture; for example, brew install foo --build-bottle --bottle-arch=penryn. Just remember that if you build for a newer architecture some of your users might get binaries they can’t run and that would be sad!

By default, bottles will be built for the oldest CPU supported by the OS/architecture you’re building for (Core 2 for 64-bit OSs). This ensures that bottles are compatible with all computers you might distribute them to. If you really want your bottles to be optimized for something else, you can pass the --bottle-arch= option to build for another architecture; for example, brew install foo --build-bottle --bottle-arch=penryn. Just remember that if you build for a newer architecture some of your users might get binaries they can’t run and that would be sad!
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，将为您要为其构建的OS /体系结构所支持的最旧的CPU（针对64位OS的Core 2）构建Bottle。这样可以确保瓶子与您可能将其分发到的所有计算机兼容。如果您确实希望对瓶子进行其他优化，则可以传递 --bottle-arch= 选项以为其他体系结构进行构建。例如， brew install foo --build-bottle --bottle-arch=penryn 。只需记住，如果您为较新的体系结构进行构建，则您的某些用户可能会获得二进制文件，这些二进制文件将无法运行，这将是令人遗憾的！

trans-unit.source: Detailed explanation about why we use Method Signatures and its syntax can be found here. The only extra thing to keep in mind is that we add method signatures to RBI files instead of the actual method definition in the code. This way we preserve the original code structure and everything related to Sorbet is kept within the Library/Homebrew/sorbet directory.

Detecting whether a setup.py uses setup() from setuptools or distutils is difficult, but we always need to pass this flag to setuptools-based scripts. pip faces the same problem that we do and forces setup() to use the setuptools version by loading a shim around setup.py that imports setuptools before doing anything else. Since setuptools monkey-patches distutils and replaces its setup function, this provides a single, consistent interface. We have borrowed this code and use it in Language::Python.setup_install_args.
trans-unit.target: 检测 setup.py 是使用setuptools还是distutils中的 setup() 是很困难的，但是我们总是需要将此标志传递给基于setuptools的脚本。 pip 面临与我们相同的问题，并通过在 setup.py 周围加载一个垫片来强制 setup() 使用setuptools版本，该垫片在执行其他操作之前会导入setuptools。由于setuptools会修补distutils并替换其 setup 功能，因此这提供了一个一致的接口。我们已经借用了此代码并将其用于 Language::Python.setup_install_args 。

Distribute (not to be confused with distutils) is an obsolete fork of setuptools. Distlib is a package maintained outside the standard library which is used by pip for some low-level packaging operations and is not relevant to most setup.py users.
trans-unit.target: 分发（不要与distutils混淆）是setuptools的过时分支。Distlib是在标准库外部维护的软件包，pip使用它来进行一些低级打包操作，并且与大多数 setup.py 用户无关。

trans-unit.source: Distutils and pip use a “flat” installation hierarchy that installs modules as individual files under site-packages while easy_install installs zipped eggs to site-packages instead.
trans-unit.target: Distutils和pip使用“扁平”安装层次结构，该模块将模块作为单独的文件安装在站点软件包下，而 easy_install 则将压缩的鸡蛋安装到站点软件包中。

trans-unit.source: Distutils is a module in the Python standard library that provides developers a basic package management API. Setuptools is a module distributed outside the standard library that extends distutils. It is a convention that Python packages provide a setup.py that calls the setup() function from either distutils or setuptools.
trans-unit.target: Distutils是Python标准库中的模块，可为开发人员提供基本的软件包管理API。Setuptools是在标准库之外分发的模块，用于扩展distutils。按照惯例，Python软件包提供了 setup.py ，该setup.py从distutils或setuptools 调用 setup() 函数。

Every Ruby file in the codebase is divided into three strictness levels: false, true and strict. The false files only report errors related to the syntax, constant resolution and correctness of the method signatures, and not type errors. We use this file to override strictness on a file-by-file basis. Our longtime goal is to move all false files to true and start reporting type errors on those files as well. If you are making changes that require adding a new ruby file, we would urge you to add it to true and work out the resulting type errors. Read more about Sorbet’s strictness levels here.

trans-unit.source: Files in the .drawio.svg format can be processed offline.

Files with the .drawio.svg extension are SVG files with embedded draw.io source code. Using that format lends itself to a developer-friendly workflow: it is valid SVG, plays well with git diff and can be edited in lock-step using various online and offline flavours of draw.io. If you use VS Code, you can use an extension for draw.io integration.

trans-unit.source: First, check the pull requests in the homebrew-core or linuxbrew-core repositories (whichever apply) to make sure there isn’t already an open PR. You may also want to look through closed pull requests for the formula, as sometimes formulae run into problems preventing them from being updated and it’s better to be aware of any issues before putting significant effort into an update.

First, check to make sure your issue is not listed in the FAQ or Common Issues and can’t otherwise be resolved with the information in the Tips and Tricks documentation. Next, go through the steps in the Troubleshooting guide.

Firstly, the overall environment in which Homebrew runs is filtered to avoid environment contamination breaking from-source builds (https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/issues/932). In particular, this process filters all but the given whitelisted variables, but allows environment variables prefixed with HOMEBREW_. The specific implementation can be seen in bin/brew.

Firstly, the overall environment in which Homebrew runs is filtered to avoid environment contamination breaking from-source builds (https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/issues/932). In particular, this process filters all but the given whitelisted variables, but allows environment variables prefixed with HOMEBREW_. The specific implementation can be seen in bin/brew.
trans-unit.target: 首先，对运行Homebrew的整个环境进行过滤，以避免环境污染破坏源代码的构建（https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/issues/932）。特别是，此过程将过滤除给定白名单变量之外的所有变量，但允许以 HOMEBREW_ 开头的环境变量。具体的实现可以在 bin/brew 中看到。

For Homebrew maintainers, formulae should only ever be migrated into and within the Homebrew organisation (e.g. from Homebrew/core to Homebrew/cask, or from a third-party tap to Homebrew/core), and never out of it.

For Python formulae, running brew update-python-resources <formula> will automatically add the necessary resource stanzas for the dependencies of your Python application to the formula. Note that brew update-python-resources is run automatically by brew create if you pass the --python flag. If brew update-python-resources is unable to determine the correct resource stanzas, homebrew-pypi-poet is a good third-party alternative that may help.

For brewed Python, modules installed with pip3 or python3 setup.py install will be installed to the $(brew --prefix)/lib/pythonX.Y/site-packages directory (explained above). Executable Python scripts will be in $(brew --prefix)/bin.

trans-unit.source: Formula requiring MPI should use OpenMPI by adding depends_on "open-mpi" to the formula, rather than MPICH. These packages have conflicts and provide the same standardised interfaces. Choosing a default implementation and requiring it to be adopted allows software to link against multiple libraries that rely on MPI without creating un-anticipated incompatibilities due to differing MPI runtimes.

Formula requiring MPI should use OpenMPI by adding depends_on "open-mpi" to the formula, rather than MPICH. These packages have conflicts and provide the same standardized interfaces. Choosing a default implementation and requiring it to be adopted allows software to link against multiple libraries that rely on MPI without creating un-anticipated incompatibilities due to differing MPI runtimes.
trans-unit.target: 需要MPI的公式应使用OpenMPI，方法是在公式中添加 depends_on "open-mpi" ，而不是MPICH。这些软件包存在冲突，并提供相同的标准化接口。选择默认实现并要求采用默认实现，可使软件链接到依赖MPI的多个库，而不会由于不同的MPI运行时而导致无法预期的不兼容性。

GUI apps on macOS don’t have /usr/local/bin in their PATH by default. If you’re on Mountain Lion or later, you can fix this by running sudo launchctl config user path "/usr/local/bin:$PATH" and then rebooting, as documented in man launchctl. Note that this sets the launchctl PATH for all users. For earlier versions of macOS, see this page.

GUI apps on macOS don’t have /usr/local/bin in their PATH by default. If you’re on Mountain Lion or later, you can fix this by running sudo launchctl config user path "/usr/local/bin:$PATH" and then rebooting, as documented in man launchctl. Note that this sets the launchctl PATH for all users. For earlier versions of macOS, see this page.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，macOS上的GUI应用程序的 PATH 中没有 /usr/local/bin 。如果您使用的是Mountain Lion或更高版本，则可以通过运行 sudo launchctl config user path "/usr/local/bin:$PATH" 然后重新启动来解决此问题，如 man launchctl 中所述。请注意，这将为所有用户设置launchctl PATH 。对于早期版本的macOS，请参阅此页面。

trans-unit.source: Generate a bottle (binary package) from a formula that was installed with --build-bottle. If the formula specifies a rebuild version, it will be incremented in the generated DSL. Passing --keep-old will attempt to keep it at its original value, while --no-rebuild will remove it.
trans-unit.target: 根据与 --build-bottle 一起安装的公式生成一个瓶子（二进制包）。如果公式指定了重建版本，则它将在生成的DSL中递增。传递 --keep-old 将尝试将其保留为原始值，而 --no-rebuild 会将其移除。

trans-unit.source: Generate a formula for the downloadable file at URL and open it in the editor. Homebrew will attempt to automatically derive the formula name and version, but if it fails, you’ll have to make your own template. The wget formula serves as a simple example. For the complete API, see: http://www.rubydoc.info/github/Homebrew/brew/master/Formula
trans-unit.target: 生成 URL 上可下载文件的公式，然后在编辑器中将其打开。Homebrew将尝试自动导出公式名称和版本，但是如果失败，则必须制作自己的模板。该 wget 的公式作为一个简单的例子。有关完整的API，请参见：http : //www.rubydoc.info/github/Homebrew/brew/master/Formula

trans-unit.source: Get a patch from a GitHub commit or pull request and apply it to Homebrew. Optionally, publish updated bottles for the formulae changed by the patch.

trans-unit.source: GitHub Flavoured Markdown. GitHub’s implementation is the standard, period.
trans-unit.target: GitHub风味Markdown。GitHub的实现是标准时期。

trans-unit.source: Give your issue a descriptive title which includes the formula name (if applicable) and the version of macOS or Linux you are using. For example, if a formula fails to build, title your issue “<formula> failed to build on <10.x>”, where “<formula>” is the name of the formula that failed to build, and “<10.x>” is the version of macOS or Linux you are using.
trans-unit.target: 给您的问题提供描述性标题，其中包括公式名称（如果适用）以及您使用的macOS或Linux的版本。例如，如果公式生成失败，则将您的问题命名为“ <formula>在<10.x>上构建失败”，其中“ <formula>”是构建失败的公式的名称，而“ <10。 x>”是您使用的macOS或Linux的版本。

trans-unit.source: Giving style and usage feedback on a PR or commit that involves documents is okay and encouraged. But keep in mind that these are just guidelines, and for any change, the author may have made a deliberate choice to break these rules in the interest of understandability or aesthetics.
trans-unit.target: 对涉及文档的PR或提交给出风格和使用反馈是可以的,也是值得鼓励的。但请记住,这些只是指导原则,对于任何改变,作者可能会为了可理解性或美学而故意选择打破这些规则。

trans-unit.source: Go to the relevant repository (e.g. https://github.com/Homebrew/brew, https://github.com/Homebrew/homebrew-core, etc.) and create a pull request to request review and merging of the commits in your pushed branch. Explain why the change is needed and, if fixing a bug, how to reproduce the bug. Make sure you have done each step in the checklist that appears in your new PR.
trans-unit.target: 转到相关的库（如https://github.com/Homebrew/brew，https://github.com/Homebrew/homebrew-core等），并创建一个拉请求，要求审查，并在提交的合并您推送的分支。说明为什么需要进行更改，如果要修复错误，则说明如何重现该错误。确保已完成新PR中显示的清单中的每个步骤。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew automatically uninstalls old versions of a formula after that formula is upgraded with brew upgrade, and periodically performs additional cleanup every 30 days.

Homebrew build environment that uses years-battle-hardened build logic to help your ./configure && make && make install and even your gem install succeed. Especially handy if you run Homebrew in an Xcode-only configuration since it adds tools like make to your PATH which build systems would not find otherwise.

Homebrew can run on 32-bit ARM (Raspberry Pi and others) and 64-bit ARM (AArch64), but no binary packages (bottles) are available. Support for ARM is on a best-effort basis. Pull requests are welcome to improve the experience on ARM platforms.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew可以在32位ARM(Raspberry Pi和其他)和64位ARM(AArch64)上运行,但没有二进制包(瓶)。对ARM的支持是基于尽力而为的。欢迎提出Pull请求,以改善ARM平台上的体验。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew comes with a number of standard test fixtures, including numerous sample images, sounds, and documents in various formats. You can get the file path to a test fixture with test_fixtures("test.svg").
Homebrew comes with completion definitions for the brew command. Some packages also provide completion definitions for their own programs.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew附带了 brew 命令的完成定义。一些软件包还为自己的程序提供完成定义。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew depends on having an up-to-date version of Xcode because it comes with specific versions of build tools, e.g. clang.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew依赖于Xcode的最新版本，因为它带有特定版本的构建工具，例如 clang 。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew depends on having an up-to-date version of Xcode because it comes with specific versions of build tools, e.g. clang. Installing a custom version of GCC or Autotools into your PATH has the potential to break lots of compiles so we prefer the Apple or Homebrew-provided compilers. Cross-compilers based on GCC will typically be “keg-only” and therefore not linked into your PATH by default, or are prefixed with the target architecture, again to avoid conflicting with Apple or Homebrew compilers.

Homebrew does not currently support 32-bit x86 platforms. It would be possible for Homebrew to work on 32-bit x86 platforms with some effort. An interested and dedicated person could maintain a fork of Homebrew to develop support for 32-bit x86.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew目前不支持32位x86平台。经过一些努力,Homebrew有可能在32位x86平台上运行。有兴趣的人和有心人可以维护Homebrew的分叉,开发对32位x86的支持。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew doesn’t package already-packaged language-specific libraries. These should be installed directly from gem/cpan/pip etc.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew不会打包已经打包的特定语言的库。这些应该直接从 gem / cpan / pip 等安装。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew draws a distinction between Python applications and Python libraries. The difference is that users generally do not care that applications are written in Python; it is unusual that a user would expect to be able to import foo after installing an application. Examples of applications are ansible and jrnl.

Homebrew draws a distinction between Python applications and Python libraries. The difference is that users generally do not care that applications are written in Python; it is unusual that a user would expect to be able to import foo after installing an application. Examples of applications are ansible and jrnl.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew在Python 应用程序和Python 库之间进行了区分。不同之处在于用户通常不关心应用程序是用Python编写的；用户期望在安装应用程序后能够 import foo 是不寻常的。应用的实例是 ansible 和 jrnl 。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew expects to find manual pages in #{prefix}/share/man/..., and not in #{prefix}/man/....
trans-unit.target: Homebrew希望在 #{prefix}/share/man/... 中找到手册页，而不在 #{prefix}/man/... 中找到手册页。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew formulae should avoid having multiple, separate, upstream projects bundled together in a single package to avoid shipping outdated/insecure versions of software that is already a formula.

Homebrew gathers anonymous aggregate user behaviour analytics using Google Analytics. You will be notified the first time you run brew update or install Homebrew. Analytics are not enabled until after this notice is shown, to ensure that you can opt out without ever sending analytics data.
Homebrew has begun gathering anonymous aggregate user behaviour analytics and reporting these to Google Analytics. You will be notified the first time you run brew update or install Homebrew.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew已开始收集匿名聚合用户行为分析并将其报告给Google Analytics（分析）。首次运行 brew update 或安装Homebrew 时将通知您。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew has multiple levels of environment variable filtering which affects variables available to formulae.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew有多个级别的环境变量过滤,会影响公式可用的变量。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew has since stopped supporting SHA1 and MD5 entirely. MD5 checksums were removed from core formulae in 2012 and as of April 2015 installing a formula verified by MD5 is actively blocked.
trans-unit.target: 此后，Homebrew不再完全支持SHA1和MD5。2012年从核心公式中删除了MD5校验和，并且自2015年4月起，积极禁止安装由MD5验证的公式。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew installs to the Cellar and then symlinks some of the installation into /usr/local so that other programs can see what’s going on. We suggest you brew ls a few of the kegs in your Cellar to see how it is all arranged.
trans-unit.target: 将Homebrew安装到 Cellar ，然后将一些安装符号链接到 /usr/local ,以便其他程序可以看到发生了什么。我们建议您 brew ls 几个小桶在你的酒窖，看看它是如何全部安排。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew is happy to accept applications that are built in Python, whether the apps are available from PyPI or not. Homebrew generally won’t accept libraries that can be installed correctly with pip install foo. Bindings may be installed for packages that provide them, especially if equivalent functionality isn’t available through pip.
trans-unit.target: 无论是否可以从PyPI获得，Homebrew都很乐意接受使用Python构建的应用程序。Homebrew通常不会接受可以通过 pip install foo 正确安装的库。可以为提供绑定的软件包安装绑定，尤其是在pip无法提供等效功能的情况下。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew is installed to a prefix other than the standard /usr/local (although some bottles support this).
trans-unit.target: 将Homebrew安装到标准 /usr/local 以外的前缀（尽管有些瓶子支持此功能）。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew is provided free of charge and run entirely by volunteers in their spare time. As a result, we do not have the resources to do detailed user studies of Homebrew users to decide on how best to design future features and prioritise current work. Anonymous aggregate user analytics allow us to prioritise fixes and features based on how, where and when people use Homebrew. For example:

trans-unit.source: Homebrew is the easiest and most flexible way to install the UNIX tools Apple didn’t include with macOS. It can also install software not packaged for your Linux distribution to your home directory without requiring sudo.

trans-unit.source: Homebrew wants to maintain a consistent Ruby style across all formulae mostly based on Ruby Style Guide. Other formulae may not have been updated to match this guide yet but all new ones should. Also:

trans-unit.source: Homebrew will try to guess the formula’s name from its URL. If it fails to do so you can override this with brew create <URL> --set-name <name>.
trans-unit.target: 自制程序将尝试从其URL猜测公式的名称。如果这样做失败，则可以使用 brew create <URL> --set-name <name> 覆盖它。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew’s site-packages directory is first created if (1) any Homebrew formula with Python bindings are installed, or (2) upon brew install python.
trans-unit.target: 如果（1）安装了任何带有Python绑定的Homebrew公式，或者（2）在 brew install python 上，则首先创建Homebrew的 site-packages 目录。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew’s OpenSSL is keg_only to avoid conflicting with the system so sometimes formulae need to have environment variables set or special configuration flags passed to locate our OpenSSL. You can see this mechanism in the clamav formula. Usually this is unnecessary because Homebrew sets up our build environment to favour finding keg_only formulae first.

Homebrew’s OpenSSL is keg_only to avoid conflicting with the system so sometimes formulae need to have environment variables set or special configuration flags passed to locate our OpenSSL. You can see this mechanism in the clamav formula. Usually this is unnecessary because Homebrew sets up our build environment to favour finding keg_only formulae first.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew的OpenSSL为 keg_only ,以避免与系统冲突，因此有时公式需要设置环境变量或传递特殊配置标志以定位我们的OpenSSL。您可以在 clamav 公式中看到此机制。通常这是不必要的，因为Homebrew会设置我们的构建环境，以便 keg_only 查找keg_only公式。

Homebrew’s versions are not intended to be used for any old versions you personally require for your project. You should create your own tap for formulae you or your organisation wish to control the versioning of or those that do not meet the above standards. Software that has regular API or ABI breaking releases still needs to meet all the above requirements; that a brew upgrade has broken something for you is not an argument for us to add and maintain a formula for you.

trans-unit.source: Homebrew’s versions should not be used to “pin” formulae to your personal requirements. You should instead create your own tap for formulae you or your organisation wish to control the versioning of, or those that do not meet the above standards. Software that has regular API or ABI breaking releases still needs to meet all the above requirements; that a brew upgrade has broken something for you is not an argument for us to add and maintain a formula for you.

If set, brew update only lists updates to installed software.
If set, always assume --debug when running commands.

If set, always use a Homebrew-installed git(1) rather than the system version. Automatically set if the system version of git is too old.
If set, always use the latest stable tag (even if developer commands have been run).
If set, disable all use of legacy compatibility code.

If set, do not check for broken dependents after installing, upgrading or reinstalling formulae.

If set, do not print text with colour added.

If set, do not use the GitHub API, e.g. for searches or fetching relevant issues after a failed install.
If set, enable runtime typechecking using Sorbet.
If set, fail on the failure of installation from a bottle rather than falling back to building from source.
If set, forbid redirects from secure HTTPS to insecure HTTP.
If set, force colour output on non-TTY outputs.
If set, pass --verbose when invoking curl(1).
If set, pass the -A option when calling sudo(8).
If set, print install times for each formula at the end of the run.
If set, refuse to load formulae. This is useful when formulae are not trusted (such as in pull requests).
If set, running Homebrew on Linux will use URLs for macOS. This is useful when merging pull requests for macOS while on Linux.
If set, tweak behaviour to be more relevant for Homebrew developers (active or budding) by e.g. turning warnings into errors.
If set, use bat for the brew cat command.
If set, use Pry for the brew irb command.
If set, verbose output will print a . no more than once a minute. This can be useful to avoid long-running Homebrew commands being killed due to no output.

trans-unit.source: If there is a formula that currently exists in the Homebrew/homebrew-core repository or has existed in the past (i.e. was migrated or deleted), you can recover it for your own use with the brew extract command. This will copy the desired version of the formula into a custom tap. For example, if your project depends on automake 1.12 instead of the most recent version, you can obtain the automake formula at version 1.12 by running brew extract automake <YOUR_GITHUB_USER>/<YOUR_TAP_REPOSITORY_NAME> --version=1.12. Formulae obtained this way may contain deprecated, disabled or removed Homebrew syntax (e.g. checksums may be sha1 instead of sha256); the brew extract command does not edit or update formulae to meet current standards and style requirements.
trans-unit.target: 如果Homebrew / homebrew-core存储库中当前存在一个公式，或者过去已经存在（即已迁移或删除）该公式，则可以使用 brew extract 命令恢复该公式以供自己使用。这会将所需版本的公式复制到自定义水龙头中。例如，如果你的项目依赖 automake 1.12，而不是最新的版本，你可以得到 automake 运行在1.12版本的配方 brew extract automake <YOUR_GITHUB_USER>/<YOUR_TAP_REPOSITORY_NAME> --version=1.12 。以这种方式获得的公式可能包含不推荐使用，禁用或删除的Homebrew语法（例如，校验和可以是 sha1 而不是 sha256 ）；在 brew extract 该命令不会编辑或更新公式以满足当前的标准和样式要求。

trans-unit.source: If you wish to build against custom non-Homebrew dependencies that are provided by Homebrew (e.g. a non-Homebrew, non-macOS ruby) then you must create and maintain your own tap as these formulae will not be accepted in Homebrew/homebrew-core. Once you have done that you can specify env :std in the formula which will allow e.g. which ruby to access your existing PATH variable and allow compilation to link against this Ruby. You can also include a custom Requirement in your formula that more accurately describes the non-Homebrew software you build against.

This will allow both nginx and nginx-full to be installed at the same time (assuming one is keg_only or the linked files do not clash).

trans-unit.source: Libraries built for Python 3 should include depends_on "python@3.x", which will bottle against Homebrew’s Python 3.x. Python 2.x libraries must function when they are installed against either the system Python or brewed Python.

Libraries may be installed to libexec and added to sys.path by writing a .pth file (named like “homebrew-foo.pth”) to the prefix site-packages. This simplifies the ensuing drama if pip is accidentally used to upgrade a Homebrew-installed package and prevents the accumulation of stale .pyc files in Homebrew’s site-packages.
trans-unit.target: 通过将 .pth 文件（命名为“ homebrew-foo.pth”）写入 prefix site-packages，可以将库安装到 libexec 并添加到 sys.path 中。如果 pip 意外用于升级安装了Homebrew的程序包，这可以简化后续操作，并防止在Homebrew的站点程序包中积累陈旧的.pyc文件。

trans-unit.source: One of the most frequent errors that we’ve encountered is: 7003: Method does not exist. Since Ruby is a very dynamic language, methods can be defined in ways Sorbet cannot see statically. In such cases, check if the method exists at runtime, if not, then Sorbet has caught a future bug! But, it is also possible that even though a method exists at runtime, Sorbet cannot see it. In such cases, we use *.rbi files. Read more about RBI files here.

One reason is executables go in /usr/local/bin. Usually this isn’t a writable location. But if you installed Homebrew as we recommend, /usr/local will be writable without sudo. So now you are good to install the development tools you need without risking the use of sudo.
trans-unit.target: 原因之一是可执行文件位于 /usr/local/bin 中。通常这不是可写的位置。但是，如果按照我们的建议安装了Homebrew，则无需sudo即可写入 /usr/local 。因此，现在您可以很好地安装所需的开发工具，而不必冒险使用sudo了。

trans-unit.source: Optionally contains the URL root used to calculate bottle URLs. By default this is omitted and the Homebrew default bottle URL root is used. This may be useful for taps which wish to provide bottles for their formulae or to cater for a non-default HOMEBREW_CELLAR.
trans-unit.target: （可选）包含用于计算瓶子URL的URL根。默认情况下，将省略此名称，并使用Homebrew默认瓶URL根。这对于希望为其配方提供瓶子或迎合非默认 HOMEBREW_CELLAR 的水龙头很有用。

trans-unit.source: Optionally contains the rebuild version of the bottle. Sometimes bottles may need be updated without bumping the version of the formula, e.g. a new patch was applied. In that case the rebuild will have a value of 1 or more.
trans-unit.target: 可选地包含瓶子的重建版本。有时瓶子可能需要更新而不影响公式的版本,例如应用了一个新的补丁。在这种情况下,重建的值将为1或更多。

trans-unit.source: Optionally contains the value of HOMEBREW_CELLAR in which the bottles were built. Most compiled software contains references to its compiled location so cannot be simply relocated anywhere on disk. If this value is :any or :any_skip_relocation this means that the bottle can be safely installed in any Cellar as it did not contain any references to its installation Cellar. This can be omitted if a bottle is compiled (as all default Homebrew ones are) for the default HOMEBREW_CELLAR of /usr/local/Cellar.
trans-unit.target: （可选）包含在其中构建瓶子的 HOMEBREW_CELLAR 的值。大多数已编译软件都包含对其已编译位置的引用，因此不能简单地将其重新放置在磁盘上的任何位置。如果此值是 :any 或 :any_skip_relocation ,则表示该瓶子可以安全地安装在任何酒窖中，因为它不包含任何对其安装酒窖的引用。如果为 /usr/local/Cellar 的默认 HOMEBREW_CELLAR 编译了一个瓶子（就像所有默认的Homebrew一样），则可以省略该变量。

trans-unit.source: Optionally contains the value of HOMEBREW_PREFIX in which the bottles were built. See description of cellar. When cellar is :any or :any_skip_relocation the prefix should be omitted.
trans-unit.target: （可选）包含在其中构建瓶子的 HOMEBREW_PREFIX 的值。见 cellar 描述。当 cellar 为 :any 或 :any_skip_relocation 时，前缀应省略。

trans-unit.source: Optionally returns a boolean to decide whether a bottle should be used for this formula. For example a bottle may break if another formula has been compiled with non-default options, so this method could check for that case and return false.
trans-unit.target: （可选）返回一个布尔值，以决定是否应将瓶子用于此公式。例如，如果使用非默认选项编译了另一个公式，则瓶子可能会破裂，因此此方法可以检查这种情况并返回 false 。

trans-unit.source: Originally Homebrew was a build-from-source package manager and all user environment variables and non-Homebrew-installed software were available to builds. Since then Homebrew added Requirements to specify dependencies on non-Homebrew software (such as those provided by brew cask like X11/XQuartz), the superenv build system to strip out unspecified dependencies, environment filtering to stop the user environment leaking into Homebrew builds and default_formula to specify that a Requirement can be satisfied by a particular formula.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew最初是一个从源代码构建的软件包管理器，并且所有用户环境变量和未安装Homebrew的软件都可以构建。从那时起，Homebrew添加了 Requirement ,以指定对非Homebrew软件的依赖（例如X11 / XQuartz之类的 brew cask superenv 提供的软件），superenv构建系统去除未指定的依赖关系，环境过滤以防止用户环境泄漏到Homebrew构建中，并且 default_formula ,用于指定特定公式可以满足 Requirement 。

trans-unit.source: Our binary packages (bottles) are built on GitHub Actions and hosted by Bintray.

Our policy is that formulae in the core tap (homebrew/core) must be open-source with an OSI-approved license and either built from source or produce cross-platform binaries (e.g. Java, Mono). Binary-only formulae should go to homebrew/cask.
trans-unit.target: 我们的政策是，核心分接头（homebrew / core）中的公式必须是开放源代码且具有OSI批准的许可证，并且必须由源代码构建或生成跨平台的二进制文件（例如Java，Mono）。仅限二进制的公式应该放在homebrew / cask中。

trans-unit.source: Our policy is that formulae in the core tap (homebrew/core) must be open-source with an Debian Free Software Guidelines license and either built from source or produce cross-platform binaries (e.g. Java, Mono). Binary-only formulae should go to homebrew/cask.

trans-unit.source: Please note that our preferred commit message format for simple version updates is “<FORMULA_NAME> <NEW_VERSION>”, e.g. “source-highlight 3.1.8” but devel version updates should have the commit message suffixed with (devel), e.g. “nginx 1.9.1 (devel)”. If updating both stable and devel, the format should be a concatenation of these two forms, e.g. “x264 r2699, r2705 (devel)”.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，对于简单版本更新，我们首选的提交消息格式为“ <FORMULA_NAME> <NEW_VERSION> ”，例如“ source-highlight 3.1.8 ”，但 devel 版本更新的提交消息应带有 (devel) 后缀，例如“ nginx 1.9.1 (devel) ”。如果同时更新 stable 和 devel ，则格式应为这两种形式的串联，例如“ x264 r2699, r2705 (devel) ”。

trans-unit.source: Setuptools can be updated via pip3, without having to re-brew Python:

Setuptools provides the easy_install command, which is an end-user package management tool that fetches and installs packages from PyPI, the Python Package Index. pip is another, newer end-user package management tool, which is also provided outside the standard library. While pip supplants easy_install, pip does not replace the other functionality of the setuptools module.
trans-unit.target: Setuptools提供了 easy_install 命令，这是一个最终用户程序包管理工具，可从PyPI（Python程序包索引）获取并安装程序包。 pip 是另一个较新的最终用户包管理工具，它也在标准库之外提供。尽管pip替代了 easy_install ，但pip不会替代setuptools模块的其他功能。

trans-unit.source: Setuptools requires that SVEM is used in conjunction with --record, which provides a list of files that can later be used to uninstall the package. We don’t need or want this because Homebrew can manage uninstallation but since setuptools demands it we comply. The Homebrew convention is to call the record file “installed.txt”.
trans-unit.target: Setuptools要求SVEM与 --record 结合使用，后者提供了文件列表，这些文件以后可用于卸载软件包。我们不需要或不需要这样做，因为Homebrew可以管理卸载，但是由于setuptools要求我们遵守。自制程序的约定是将记录文件称为“ installed.txt”。

trans-unit.source: Some formulae are marked as “keg-only”, meaning that installed files are not linked to the shared bin, lib, etc. directories, as doing so can cause conflicts. Such formulae can be forced to link to the shared directories, but doing so is not recommended (and will cause brew doctor to complain.)

trans-unit.source: Some upstream software providers like to package their software in their own Homebrew tap. When their software is eligible for Homebrew/homebrew-core we prefer to maintain software there for ease of updates, improved discoverability and use of tools such as formulae.brew.sh.

Sometimes a package fails to build when using a certain compiler. Since recent Xcode versions no longer include a GCC compiler we cannot simply force the use of GCC. Instead, the correct way to declare this is the fails_with DSL method. A properly constructed fails_with block documents the latest compiler build version known to cause compilation to fail, and the cause of the failure. For example:
trans-unit.target: 有时，使用某些编译器时，软件包无法构建。由于最新的Xcode版本不再包含GCC编译器，因此我们不能简单地强制使用GCC。相反，正确的声明方式是 fails_with DSL方法。正确构造的 fails_with 块记录了已知会导致编译失败的最新编译器构建版本以及失败的原因。例如：

trans-unit.source: Sometimes formulae have version schemes that change such that a direct comparison between two versions no longer produces the correct result. For example, a project might be version 13 and then decide to become 1.0.0. As 13 is translated to 13.0.0 by our versioning system by default this requires intervention.
trans-unit.target: 有时公式的版本方案会发生变化，以至于两个版本之间的直接比较不再产生正确的结果。例如，一个项目可能是版本 13 ，然后决定成为 1.0.0 。由于默认情况下我们的版本控制系统将 13 转换为 13.0.0 ，因此需要干预。

Sorbet reports type errors along with an error reference code, which can be used to look up more information on how to debug the error, or what causes the error in the Sorbet documentation. Here is how we debug some common type errors:

Special exceptions are OpenSSL and LibreSSL. Things that use either should be built using Homebrew’s shipped equivalent and our Brew Test Bot’s post-install audit will warn if it detects you haven’t done this.

trans-unit.source: Tap formulae follow the same format as the core’s ones, and can be added at the repository’s root, or under Formula or HomebrewFormula subdirectories. We recommend the latter options because it makes the repository organisation easier to grasp, and top-level files are not mixed with formulae.

trans-unit.source: Tap formulae follow the same format as the core’s ones, and can be added under either the Formula subdirectory, the HomebrewFormula subdirectory or the repository’s root. The first available directory is used, other locations will be ignored. We recommend use of subdirectories because it makes the repository organisation easier to grasp, and top-level files are not mixed with formulae.

Tap names like homebrew/core are styled in fixed width font. Repository names may be styled in either fixed width font like “Homebrew/homebrew-core”, as links like “Homebrew/homebrew-core”, or regular text like “Homebrew/homebrew-core”, based on which looks best for a given use.
trans-unit.target: 点按名称（如 homebrew/core 以 fixed width font 设置样式。存储库名称可以使用固定宽度的字体（例如“ Homebrew/homebrew-core ”）（如“ Homebrew / homebrew-core ”）链接，也可以使用常规文本（例如“ Homebrew / homebrew-core”）设置样式，这取决于给定的外观用。

trans-unit.source: Testing and auditing the formula

Tests the full lifecycle of a Homebrew change to a tap (Git repository). For example, for a GitHub Actions pull request that changes a formula brew test-bot will ensure the system is cleaned and set up to test the formula, install the formula, run various tests and checks on it, bottle (package) the binaries and test formulae that depend on it to ensure they aren’t broken by these changes.

The brew tap command
trans-unit.target: 在 brew tap 命令

trans-unit.source: The config file. It is actually a newline-separated list of arguments to pass to srb tc, the same as if they’d been passed at the command line. Arguments in the config file are always passed first (if it exists), followed by arguments provided on the command line. We use it ignore the Library/Homebrew/vendor directory, which contains gem definitions which we do not wish to type check.

The rbi/ directory. It contains all Ruby Interface files, which help Sorbet to learn about constants, ancestors, and methods defined in ways it doesn’t understand natively. RBI files for all gems are auto-generated using Tapioca. We can also create a RBI file to help Sorbet understand dynamic definitions. For example: Sorbet assumes that Kernel is not necessarily included in our modules and classes, hence we use RBI files to explicitly include the Kernel Module. Here is an example in our codebase.

trans-unit.source: The Homebrew package manager may be used on Linux and Windows Subsystem for Linux (WSL). Homebrew was formerly referred to as Linuxbrew when running on Linux or WSL. It can be installed in your home directory, in which case it does not use sudo. Homebrew does not use any libraries provided by your host system, except glibc and gcc if they are new enough. Homebrew can install its own current versions of glibc and gcc for older distributions of Linux.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew软件包管理器可用于Linux和Linux的Windows子系统（WSL）。在Linux或WSL上运行时，Homebrew以前被称为Linuxbrew。它可以安装在您的主目录中，在这种情况下，它不使用sudo。Homebrew不使用主机系统提供的任何库，但glibc和gcc（如果足够新的话）除外。Homebrew可以为较早的Linux发行版安装自己的当前版本的glibc和gcc。

The PLC consists of five members. Committee members are elected by majority vote of Homebrew members. Each PLC member will serve a term of two years or until the member’s successor is elected. Any sudden vacancy in the PLC will be filled by the usual procedure for electing PLC members at the next general meeting, typically the next AGM.
trans-unit.target: PLC由五个成员组成。委员会成员由本土成员的多数票选举产生。每个PLC成员的任期为两年，或者直到选举出其继任者为止。PLC下的任何突然空缺将由在下届股东大会（通常是下届股东周年大会）上选举PLC成员的常规程序来填补。

trans-unit.source: The PLC may meet by any mutually agreeable means, such as text chat, voice or video call, and in person. Members of the PLC must meet at least once per quarter. Members of the PLC must meet by video call or in person at least once per year.
trans-unit.target: 可通过任何双方同意的方式,如短信聊天、语音或视频通话和亲自开会。临委会成员必须每季度至少召开一次会议。巴勒斯坦立法委员会成员必须每年至少通过视频电话或亲自出席一次会议。

trans-unit.source: The PLC will announce candidates and proposals three weeks prior to the election date.
trans-unit.target: 臨立會將於選舉日期前三星期公布候選人及建議。

trans-unit.source: The PLC will appoint between three and five members to the TSC. The Project Leader must be one of these appointees. Appointed TSC members will serve a term of one year or until the member’s successor is appointed.
trans-unit.target: PLC将在TSC中任命三到五个成员。项目负责人必须是这些任命的人之一。任命的TSC成员的任期为一年或直到任命成员的继任者为止。

trans-unit.source: The PLC will appoint the members of the Technical Steering Committee (TSC).
trans-unit.target: 臨立會將委任技術指導委員會的成員。

trans-unit.source: The PLC will deliver a report of their activities, decisions, and financial statements to the Homebrew members at the AGM.
trans-unit.target: PLC将在年度大会上向自酿会员提交活动、决定和财务报表的报告。

trans-unit.source: The PLC will meet annually to review the status of all members and remove inactive members and those who have not affirmed a commitment to Homebrew in the past year. Voting in the AGM confirms that a member wishes to remain active with the project. After the AGM, the PLC will ask the members who did not vote whether they wish to remain active with the project. The PLC removes any members who don’t respond to this second request after three weeks.
trans-unit.target: PLC将每年召开一次会议，审查所有成员的状态，并删除不活跃的成员以及在过去一年中未确认对Homebrew承诺的成员。在年度股东大会上投票确认成员希望继续参与该项目。年度股东大会结束后，PLC将询问未投票的成员是否希望继续参与该项目。PLC将删除三周后未响应第二个请求的所有成员。
